info.title: Activate a menu item in interaction mode

setupScript.name: openMenuAndSetFocusToFirstItem
setupScript.description: opens the menu, and sets focus on 'Action 1'

user: With focus on the 'Action 1' menu item, activate the menu item.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Action 1' menu item, activate the menu item.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
